heading: HB01265
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING A NATIONAL RAILWAY SYSTEM IN THE PHILIPPINES APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01265
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A NATIONAL RAILWAY SYSTEM IN THE PHILIPPINES APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BIAZON, ROZZANO RUFINO B.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-07
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Sy-Alvarado (007 2016-08-08)2. Violago (020 2017-09-07)
3. Lazatin (000 2018-02-07)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-01-31
          -A TWG was created, to be chaired by Rep. Mark Go, to consolidate all measures (19) proposing to amend the PNR, create Mindanao Railways and other rail-related measures
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2018-02-14
          -1st TWG meeting, chaired by Rep. Go. Secretariat to consolidate the 19 bills and forward substitute bill to the Committees on Appropriations and Ways and Means
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2018-03-14
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON TRANSPORTATION, LEGISLATIVE FRANCHISES
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO TRANSPORTATION on 2016-08-01;
